note.original: ka. 285; rū. 70; nī. 578; caṃ. 2.1.94; pā. 2.3.47; āmantaṇe (bahūsu)
note.previous: Āmantane

Dhātukammañca dvikammikadhātūnaṃ duvidhaṃ padhānakammaṃ, appadhānakammanti. Ajapālo ajaṃ gāmaṃ neti, puriso bhāraṃ gāmaṃ vahati, harati, gāmaṃ sākhaṃ kaḍḍhati, gāviṃ khīraṃ dohati, brāhmaṇaṃ kambalaṃ yācati, brāhmaṇaṃ bhattaṃ bhikkhati, gāviyo vajaṃ avarundhati, bhagavantaṃ pañhaṃ pucchati, rukkhaṃ phalāni ocināti, sissaṃ dhammaṃ bravīti, bhagavā bhikkhū etadavoca
Pabbataṃ anu tiṭṭhati
nāma, puriso yānena gacchati, pharasunā
, asambhinnena vilepanena rājānamadakkhi, tidaṇḍakena paribbājakamadakkhi, ūnapañcabandhanena pattena aññaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeti
Annena vasati, vijjāya sādhu, kammunā vattati loko, kammunā vattati pajā
. Gottena gotamo nātho
. Dvidoṇena dhaññaṃ kiṇāti, sahassena asse vikkiṇāti, attanāva attānaṃ sammannati
, vadeyyātha bhante yenattho, pānīyena

note.original: ka. 293; rū. 301; nī. 605; catutthī sampadāne (bahūsu), caṃ. 2.1.73; pā. 2.3.13
note.previous: Sampadāne catutthī
, tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ lūkhāni bhojanāni nacchādenti
Buddhassa silāghate, thometīti attho, tuyhaṃ hanute, tuṇhibhāvena vañcetīti attho, bhikkhunī bhikkhussa bhuñjamānassa pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upaṭṭhāti
, tassa rañño mayaṃ nāgaṃ dhārayāma. Tattha ‘rañño sataṃ dhāretī’ti sataṃ balidhanaṃ vā daṇḍadhanaṃ vā nidetīti
attho, iṇaṃ katvā gaṇhātī’’ti ca vadanti. ‘Dhārayāmā’ti puna nidema
te pihayanti tādino
, mā me kujjha rathesabha
, mittānaṃ na dubbheyya, titthiyā issanti samaṇānaṃ, ussūyanti dujjanā guṇavantānaṃ, pativissakānaṃ ujjhāpesi
, mā tumhe tassa ujjhāyittha
, āmantayāmi vo bhikkhave
Maññanāpayoge anādare apāṇismimeva catutthī, kaṭṭhassa tuvaṃ maññe, kaliṅgarassa
, urasmā jāto, ure jāto vā, cīvaraṃ uppajjeyya saṅghato vā gaṇato vā ñātimittato vā

note.original: ka. 272; rū. 309; nī. 558, 568; caṃ. 2.1.85; pā. 2.3.32; ‘vināññatra tatiyāca’ (bahūsu)

alternatives.alternative: ka. 272; rū. 309; nī. 558, 568; caṃ. 2.1.85; pā. 2.3.32; ‘vināññatra tatiyāca’

note.previous: Vināññatrehi tatiyā ca

note.original: ka. 272; rū. 309; nī. 558, 568; caṃ. 2.1.86; pā. 2.3.32; ‘puthanānāhi ca’ (bahūsu)
note.previous: Puthunānāhi ca
, na naṃ jāti nivāreti, duggatyā garahāya vā
Yasmiṃ ṭhāne antaradhāyati, tasmiṃ sattamī eva dissati, atikhippaṃ loke cakkhu antaradhāyissati
Kasmā hetunā, kena hetunā, kasmā nu tumhaṃ kule daharā na miyyare
, catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ anaññā appaṭivedhā dīghamaddhānaṃ saṃsaranti
kiṃ? Paccati munino bhattaṃ, thokaṃ thokaṃ ghare ghareti
kvaci kammani chaṭṭhī, alajjīnaṃ nissāya, āyasmato nissāya vacchāmi, catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo
Tabba, rujādiyoge pana sampadāne catutthī eva, yakkhasenāpatīnaṃ ujjhāpetabbaṃ vikkanditabbaṃ viravitabbaṃ
, maggāmaggassa kovidā, keci iddhīsu kovidā’’tipi atthi, santi yakkhā buddhassa pasannā

note.original: ka. 313; rū. 327; nī. 644; caṃ. 2.1.90; pā. 2.3.37; ‘yabbhā vo’ (bahūsu)
note.previous: Yambhāvo bhāvalakkhaṇaṃ
Acirapakkantassa sāriputtassa brāhmaṇo kālamakāsi
, appamattassa te viharato itthāgāropi te appamatto viharissati
paṭhamāpi bahulaṃ dissati, gacchanto so bhāradvājo, addasā accutaṃ isiṃ
Maccu gacchati ādāya, pekkhamāne mahājane. Ākoṭayanto so neti, sivirājassa pekkhato
. Akāmakānaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ rudantānaṃ pabbaji, anagāriyupetassa, vippamuttassa te sato. Samaṇassa na taṃ sādhu, yadaññamanusocati
